mapper.select: select tp.post_id as postId, tp.title ,tp.requirement , tp.open_id as openId ,tp.job_type as jobType , tp.reliability ,tp.post_time as postTime , tp.Internship_time as internshipTime ,tp.entry_time as entryTime , tp.delivery_method as deliveryMethod , tp.state ,tp.job_description as jobDescription ,tp.work_address as workAddress, tpt.type_name as typeName , tpt.type_name as typeName , tc.company_name as companyName , tc.company_logo as companyLogo, t.city_name as cityName from tb_post tp left join tb_post_type tpt on tp.type_id = tpt.type_id left join tb_company tc on tp.company_id = tc.company_id left join tb_city t on tp.city_id = t.city_id where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
